2017-12-18 17:03:59 Bruno Carlin <bruno.carlin@waarp.org> src/main/java/org/waarp/openr66/commander/InternalRunner.java v f2375101336f0ca76db8e05c32257c09c1b5bc1e

Increase the backlog of submitted transfers

The use of a fixed-length ArrayBlockingQueue limit the queue size to 10.
Moving it to a LinkedListBlockingQueue removes this limit.
2017-12-18 16:58:37 Bruno Carlin <bruno.carlin@waarp.org> src/main/java/org/waarp/openr66/protocol/configuration/Configuration.java v 7ff2cec9b4e567d56d65286c453d048864840a38

Increase the number of LocalWorker threads

A transfer needs more than 1 Localworker thread. When the limit number of
possible concurrent transfers is reached, it drives to a deadlock situation
where transfer cannot finish becaus the Localworker pool is exhausted.
2017-12-18 16:39:38 Bruno Carlin <bruno.carlin@waarp.org> src/main/java/org/waarp/openr66/protocol/networkhandler/packet/NetworkPacketCodec.java v f9c378e31d71be33e11719bf4ae13a0f57b61921

Fixes a possible memory leak reported by netty
2017-12-18 16:26:12 Bruno Carlin <bruno.carlin@waarp.org> src/main/java/org/waarp/openr66/client/SpooledDirectoryTransfer.java v 1a7cd339db3453cc45ac8e8ec2c0e90822f54eef

Set a default value for fileinfo in SpooledDirectory conf

Without it, and when fileinfo is not provided on command line or in the XML
config file, database insertions violate the NOT NULL constraint on the database
column
